law.catch_line: The boundaries of the metropolitan district are the same as existed on October 1, 2012, with the exc...
law.text: The boundaries of the metropolitan district are the same as existed on October 1, 2012, with the exclusion of any property annexed into the City of Rockville, the City of Gaithersburg, or the Town of Washington Grove under Chapter 429 of the Acts of the General Assembly of 2007.
